question: Which country was the location of the event "1979 Khuzestan insurgency"?
explanation: Iran was the location of the event "1979 Khuzestan insurgency". The 1979 Khuzestan uprising was one of the nationwide uprisings in Iran, which erupted in the aftermath of the Iranian Revolution. The unrest was fed by Arab demands for autonomy. The uprising was effectively quelled by Iranian security forces, resulting in more than a hundred people on both sides killed.
